entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries or a few snow squalls ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
